Title: Red Shoes and the Seven Dwarfs
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Romance
Director: Sung-ho Hong, Moo-Hyun Jang(co-director), Young Sik Uhm(co-director)
Writer: WoongSub Ahn (original story), Sung-ho Hong, WooChul Jung (original story), ChangWon Kim (original story), WooSuk Yang (original story)
Actors: Chloë Grace Moretz, Sam Claflin, Gina Gershon, Patrick Warburton
Plot: Princes who have been turned into Dwarfs seek the red shoes of a lady in order to break the spell, although it will not be easy. A parody with a twist.
